name: [NSFW 18+] Earn Your Freedom
description:
I'm happy to announce that I've just created a new game called "Earn Your Freedom". In this game you play as a regular teenager guy, who gets kidnapped and is forced to work in the brothel.

Gay sex scenes are present in the game, if it's not for you, please don't download.

Please check it out and leave your comments/suggestions.

Also, please check out my Patreon page
